definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: This product sells well, there are no goods remaining every month.
sentences.chinese: 這種產品銷路順暢，基本上每月都是滿產滿銷。

sentences.english: We regret we cannot find any market for this write-up.
sentences.chinese: 我們很陪罪不能爲此項商品找到銷路。

sentences.english: So many copies were sold that the factory was producing 320,000 copies of the record every day.
sentences.chinese: 唱片的銷路非常好，以致唱片廠的日產量達32萬張。

sentences.english: We regret we cannot find any market for this article.
sentences.chinese: 我們很抱愧不能爲此項商品找到銷路。

sentences.english: Kingfisher beer is popular wherever spicy curries are eaten.
sentences.chinese: 在所有咖喱飯盛行之處，都有翠豐啤酒的銷路。

sentences.english: Packing is connecting with the product saling.
sentences.chinese: 包裝對產品的銷路有很大關係。
這個設想本身就有銷路。

sentences.english: Package is closely related to the market of the product.
sentences.chinese: 包裝對產品的銷路有很大關係。

sentences.english: According to our experience， these handicrafts can find a ready market in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 根據我們的經驗，這些手工藝品在日本銷路很好。

sentences.english: Commodity with good quality can be salable.
sentences.chinese: 商品的質量好纔能有銷路。

sentences.english: Your quinces and pineapple guavas have gone quickly.
sentences.chinese: 你的榲桲和鳳梨芭樂銷路挺快。

sentences.english: House dresses usually sell better when more expensive lines have tough sledding.
sentences.chinese: 較昂貴的衣服滯銷時，家常服通常銷路都較好。

sentences.english: There is no market for these articles.
This offer is competitive and based on an expanding market..
sentences.chinese: 此報盤着眼於擴大銷路而且很有競爭性。

sentences.english: If the dictionary is properly marketed, it should sell very well.
sentences.chinese: 這部詞典如適當加以推銷，銷路肯定很好。

sentences.english: We are striving to seek  the sale for this product.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在努力爲此項商品找銷路。

definition: to have perfect mastery of sth/to be up to the mark
to be nothing to write home about (idiom)
the rarer sth is, the greater its value (idiom)
